title: Ozark National Scenic Riverways: Do Business With Us
body: Do Business With Us       COMMERCIAL USE AUTHORIZATION  A Commercial Use Authorization is required in most cases for anyone doing business within the park. This includes anyone wishing to sell items or food within the park boundary, lead guided fishing expeditions, or similar activities. Some activities may be managed under a Concessions Contract. If you have questions contact Peggy Tarrence at 573-323-4864 or by e-mail. For more detailed information, click here.  Â    "Men travel far to see a city, but few seem curious about a river. Every rivers has, nevertheless, its individuality, its great silent interest. Every river has, moreover, its influence over the people who pass their lives within sight of its waters". - (H.S. Merriman, The Sowers)
